scripts.publish: yarn publish:core && yarn publish:essentials && yarn publish:cli && yarn publish:aws
scripts.publish:core: yarn publish packages/core --non-interactive --access public --new-version 0.0.1-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.publish:cli: yarn publish packages/cli --non-interactive --access public --new-version 0.0.1-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.publish:aws: yarn publish packages/aws --non-interactive --access public --new-version 0.0.1-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.publish:essentials: yarn publish packages/essentials --non-interactive --access public --new-version 0.0.1-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
